text: Pope Damasus I (; c. 305 â€“ 11 December 384) was Pope of the Catholic Church. He was Pope From October 366 to his death in 384. He was born in Rome, Western Roman Empire. He is recognized as a saint by the Catholic Church. His feast day is December 11. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Portuguese people Category:Popes Category:Christian saints
title: Pope Damasus I
